mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

sn46.52:9.3.pli: ‘Kāmacchandanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:9.3.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the hindrance of sensual desire’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:9.5.pli: ‘Byāpādanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:9.5.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the hindrance of ill will’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:9.7.pli: ‘Thinamiddhanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:9.7.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the hindrance of dullness and drowsiness’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:9.9.pli: ‘Uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:9.9.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the hindrance of restlessness and remorse’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:9.11.pli: ‘Vicikicchānīvaraṇan’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:9.11.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the hindrance of doubt’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:10.3.pli: ‘Satisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:10.3.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of mindfulness’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:11.2.pli: ‘Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:11.2.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of investigation of principles’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:12.2.pli: ‘Vīriyasambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:12.2.en: That’s how what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of energy’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:13.2.pli: ‘Pītisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:13.2.en: In this way what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of rapture’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:14.2.pli: ‘Passaddhisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:14.2.en: In this way what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of tranquility’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:15.2.pli: ‘Samādhisambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:15.2.en: In this way what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of immersion’ becomes twofold.

sn46.52:16.2.pli: ‘Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo’ti iti hidaṁ uddesaṁ gacchati. Tadamināpetaṁ pariyāyena dvayaṁ hoti.
sn46.52:16.2.en: In this way what is concisely referred to as ‘the awakening factor of equanimity’ becomes twofold.

mlDocs.title:
Linked Discourses 46.52
6. Discussion
Is There a Way?

mn117:6.2.en: Right view is twofold, I say.

mn117:12.2.en: Right thought is twofold, I say.

mn117:18.2.en: Right speech is twofold, I say.

mn117:24.2.en: Right action is twofold, I say.

mn117:30.2.en: Right livelihood is twofold, I say.
